author: Levi Roots
method: Place all of the milkshake ingredients, except the ice cubes, into a blender and pulse until smooth. Serve in a tall glass over ice cubes.
ingredients: 1 banana, peeled and chopped,  2 tbsp dark rum,  250g/9oz vanilla ice cream,  100ml/3½fl oz milk,  1 tbsp caster sugar,  ½ tsp grated nutmeg,  4 ice cubes, to serve
